title: Take A Knee
description: Cari Champion welcomes ESPN The Magazine Sr. writer Howard Bryant to the show to discuss his conversation with Colin Kaepernick, the NFL's atypical weekend and the protests that are rocking the world of sports.
itunes:title: Take A Knee
itunes:author: ESPN, ESPNW, Cari Champion
itunes:subtitle: Cari Champion welcomes ESPN The Magazine Sr. writer Howard Bryant to the show to discuss his conversation with Colin Kaepernick, the NFL's atypical weekend and the protests that are rocking the world of sports.
